participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, Ethan enjoys cooking and is open to new experiences.
participant_1.background: I don't go to Comic Con because it is not my kind of thing. I love to watch my food come together and to see how the flavors blend. I almost shot a tourist while playing with my gun. I live in my hometown right now, but I'm planning to move to Australia in the future. I am the youngest of 3.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Intellectual and nurturing, Sarah is passionate about teaching and sharing her love for literature.
participant_2.background: I have to use social media for work, but it's not a big part of my life. I am fairly conservative in politics. I started a blog to share my love of romance novels with others. I have never traveled out of the country. My students are my favorite people because they make me laugh and smile every day.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
Good so far! I just got home from work. What about yours?
It is going well! I am just about to start dinner. What do you do for work?
I am a teacher. What are you having for dinner?
I am making a stir fry. I love to cook! What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to read and write. I started a blog about romance novels.
Oh that is cool! I am a big fan of romance novels. I don't go to many conventions though.
I don't go to many either. I am fairly conservative in my politics.
Oh that is interesting. I am not very political. I am the youngest of 3.
I have never traveled out of the country. I would love to go to Australia.
That is awesome! I am planning to move to Australia in the future.
Oh wow! That is a big move. What made you decide to move?
I have always wanted to live in Australia. I love the culture and the people.
That is awesome! I am sure you will love it there.
